...Japan aims to achieve these three goals together with Africa...
Building infrastructure that meets local needs...
...and spreading "kaizen," the Japanese philosophy and production method...
...saving countless lives and promoting universal health coverage.
Supporting a stable, clean water supply...
...and implementing human resource development for millions of people.
Our focus is to improve quality and provide empowerment.
Believing in the potential that the future holds,...
...Japan will work hand in hand with Africa.
